::Battera::
"Rule? Nah, ruling isn't my thing.  I just never ruled over someone before.  
But Cybertron? Now I would like to go back home.  I miss that place.  If 
your promising that you can take me back home to Cybertron, then I'll join 
you."
She missed home more that anything.  She missed her home so much.  Any 
chance that offered even a remote possability of going home overrode all her 
programming and logic circuits.
"For the chance to go home, I'll do anything. Yeah, I'll join you."

>
>*Before Baterra's message*
>
>Vulois looked down at the Predacon stalking him. Maybe this one could
>be good to join his group. She looks good at sneaking and spying. And
>maybe she knows how to use this mind whiping device. If it's meant
>for someone I can use them.
>
>"Hey Batgirl! How would you like new purpose in life? How would you
>like to join me?"
>
>*After Battera's message*
>
>Vulois answers back.
>
>"Who am I? Well, I can't tell you that until you agree to join me.
>What's in it for you? How would you like to win the Neo Beast Wars
>and than go back to Cybertron to rule?"
>
